sentence: In general i m satisfied concerning staff room brekfast and position
Its an average hotel Staff were good
Right hotel for business trips in the center and good Service
the restaurant is well above average and the hotel employees are friendly and very professional
The food was tasty and the service was also good
receptionists were friendly room was clean and quiet hotel location was fantastic
Staff were really friendly and helpful but there was not enough staff working when we were there
Great location friendly helpful staff and clean well equipped rooms
Juliane at the front desk checked us in she

Very comfortable hotel very good location The cleansing is excellent Wifi service also is excellent My general evaluation for your hotel services and employees is 10 out of 10Which means 100 satisfying
Despite réfection of hôtel services were good just some times to wait during dinner
Luckily another member of staff arrived just as I was about to return to my room in disappointment and explained it was as I suspected actually open
Un personnel atentioné

There was a mix up when we arrived as we had been given the wrong room we had booked a superior room but was given a basic room so had to get them to change it they apologised and it was soon sorted out the staff did seem short staffed it they were very helpful and polite
The receptionist was very apologetic offered to pay the recovery fee and was helpful in phoning the police and compound where the car had been towed
at 350 pm and after numerous changes of front of house staff we finally got into our room

The stay was good however once leaving the hotel and fully paying for our two night stay we are disgusted with the level of service we have rung three times to try and get the hotel to release our deposit of three hundred dollars
Service was cheap they will remove food from the buffet before time
The service in the breakfast area lacked empathy and professionalism
My French is passable but the staff were happy to help especially when explaining menus etc

Check out waiting time was about 30 mins with about 20 people waiting to check out at any one time at around 10 am with only one staff processing all the check outs while other management staff were walking pass and engorging the huge waiting line
There was only one person at the reception we had to wait half an hour to make the checkout as the only receptionist was assisting other guests with their fidelity card
